Item.Name: Health Potion
Item.Description: This vial of gently-glowing, blue liquid is capable of reviving anyone.

Item.Name: Sword
Item.Description: A trusty sword, an adventurer's loyal companion.

Item.Name: Gun
Item.Description: A finely crafted firearm. It shoots bullets and such.

Item.Name: Jamshed
Item.Description: Jamshed combines the best of jamming and shedding, whatever that means.
